module.name: part_and_zone_laminate_tables
module.name.french: Séquence de drapage des pièces et zones

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation and definition of laminate tables and the assembly order and placement of the assembled composite constituents.

inscope.li: definition of the composition a composite material product;
definition of the laminar assembly of a composite material product;
definition of the parts that comprise the composite constituents of a product;
definition of the shape of the composite material constituents of a product;

items within the scope of application module
Stock material
, ISO/TS 10303-1771.

outscope.li: representation of the shape of composite constituents

alt_map.description: Direction of the warp_surface away from the basis surface
alt_map.refpath: product_definition characterized_product_definition = product_definition characterized_definition = characterized_product_definition characterized_definition <- property_definition.definition property_definition ([property_definition.name = 'true'] [property_definition => product_definition_shape <- shape_aspect.of_shape shape_aspect])

alt_map.description: Direction of the warp_surface is towards the basis surface
alt_map.refpath: product_definition characterized_product_definition = product_definition characterized_definition = characterized_product_definition characterized_definition <- property_definition.definition property_definition ([property_definition.name = 'false'] [property_definition => product_definition_shape <- shape_aspect.of_shape shape_aspect])

alt_map.description: Direction of the warp_surface is unknown
alt_map.refpath: product_definition characterized_product_definition = product_definition characterized_definition = characterized_product_definition characterized_definition <- property_definition.definition property_definition ([property_definition.name = 'unknown'] [property_definition => product_definition_shape <- shape_aspect.of_shape shape_aspect])
